actions.text: Amendment SA 2264 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 2264 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Nickles to Amendment SA 2233. (consideration: CR S274-275; text: CR S275) To express the sense of the Senate with respect to the status of private pension plans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2264 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Nickles to Amendment SA 2233.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2264 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

amends_amendment.purpose: Substitute amendment to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to temporarily change the determination of the interest rate used for funding and other purposes from use of the 30-year treasury bond rate to a composite corporate bond rate, and for other purposes.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate with respect to the status of private pension plans.
